title: Развод по расчёту
overview: Katerina and Stepan work for a construction company and accidentally find out that the management arranges a raffle of apartments among single mothers, including employees. Without thinking twice, the couple decides to pull off a scam, ends the marriage and throws a scandal in front of colleagues. Pretending to be divorced turns out to be not so easy, and soon a fictitious divorce may turn into a real one. Will the heroes be able to pass this test of strength and become the happy owners of the cherished square meters?
